name: Mark Zuckerberg
reviews: Thank you for your good product. I use this product for 6 months. This product is working very well.

name: Shakib Al Hasan
reviews: i was expecting to receive a camera bag, memory chip etc along with the camera; thats how it is everywhere else. for the price you took, now it feels like a rip off

name: Mashrafe Bin Mortaza
reviews: Thanks for helping me a bit to make my dream come true.Purchased 4 months ago. Performing good so far.

name: Jhankar Mahbub
reviews: An easily portable DSLR that is fun and easy to use, and delivers excellent results.It is a special camera for me.

name: Elon Musk
reviews: 4K videos look great when i play them on my TV or my smartphone. 4K Frame Grab extracts photos from my movies, while the 4K time-lapse turns hours into seconds.

name: Steve Jobs
reviews: Share photos via my smartphone by linking them to the EOS 250D with Bluetooth. Wireless camera management is possible with the Canon Camera Remote app.
